# MIDIDeviceRef

**Type Alias**

A MIDI device that contains entities.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias MIDIDeviceRef = MIDIObjectRef
```

## Discussion

A device object derives from [doc://com.apple.coremidi/documentation/CoreMIDI/MIDIObjectRef]. It doesn’t have an owning object.

## Managing Device Lifecyle

- **MIDIDeviceCreate(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Creates a new device object that corresponds to the available hardware.
- **MIDIDeviceDispose(_:)**: Disposes of a MIDI device.
